products.name: Premium Brass Diya Set

products.description: Pure copper kalash with coconut holder. Ideal for griha pravesh, pujas and auspicious occasions.

products.description: Premium stainless steel dinner set for 6 people. Includes plates, bowls, glasses, and serving spoons.

products.description: 5-piece copper bottom cookware set with superior heat distribution. Perfect for Indian cooking.

products.name: Brass Serving Set
products.description: Traditional brass serving set with kadhai, karahi and serving spoons. Brings royal touch to your dining.

products.name: Premium Gift Hamper - Festive
products.description: Curated festive gift hamper with dry fruits, chocolates, decorative items and greeting card. Perfect for Diwali gifting.

products.name: Crystal Photo Frame Set
products.description: Elegant crystal photo frame set of 3 pieces. Various sizes perfect for displaying cherished memories.

products.name: Decorative Wall Clock

products.name: Premium Bedsheet Set
